extendedInfo.description: A complete music collection, commercial free, nicely organized and streamed to your Android device.  Genres include Classical, New Age, Electronica, Jazz, World, Ambient, Hip Hop, and Alt/Electro/Hard Rock.For free, you can stream over 1300 complete albums of your choice.  A short announcement at the end of each song will tell you what you just heard, and gently remind you that a low-cost monthly subscription at Magnatune.com would remove these announcements.With a membership, you can download any and all our albums, in a variety of DRM-free and perfect-quality formats.Note about logging in: some members with long and complicated passwords have had problems logging in with the Android app. We've seen problems like this with the iPhone app and long passwords, but we're not sure if the problem is that they're very hard to type, or there's a problem with Apache and long passwords. At any rate, if you change your password on Magnatune to something shorter, that seems to solve the Android-logging-in problem.

reviews.comment: If i could search about the name of the song or the singer it will be better
reviews.author: Medoo Wolf

reviews.title: Glass for the app
reviews.comment: Effective and efficient. Also quick response for help logging on. Well done Magnatune!
reviews.author: Sally-Ann Hoyne

reviews.title: Finally !!! \\(*_*)/
reviews.comment: After a month I switch different android browser just to open your site, and none of them worked like i want. Finally God answer my pray through you guys !!!  Anyway, can you added \"Popular Now\" at menu?and maybe a widget??  but if that hard just forget it, nevermind.  Thx you so much.. Cheer  !!!
reviews.author: Ono Opo

reviews.title: Great to have mobile
reviews.comment: This app fulfils the extra granular functionality I\'ve wanted for android the mobile site did not provide. Good to see official support now. So far, only change that would be nice is if the app could use notification/media controls. This would show the app is still playing and allow control from lockscreen etc.
reviews.author: Kevin Whitaker

reviews.title: Great for streaming.
reviews.comment: I\'d like to have the ability to see newly added albums and download albums from within the app though.
reviews.author: M Smith

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Magnatune is an outstanding music service and I love their app.
reviews.author: Roberto Sanchez

reviews.title: Good, but Pandora is better.
reviews.comment: Way better than the old unofficial beta, but still doesn\'t beat Pandora IMO.
reviews.author: Joseph Robarts

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love the service and have been waiting for the app. Nice work!
reviews.author: A Google User
